props.name: className

props.name: isFullscreenScroll
props.docblock:
Determines where a scrollbar should appear if a modal is too large for the
viewport. When false, the ``ModalDialog``. Body receives a scrollbar, when true
the browser window itself receives the scrollbar.

description.text:
Determines where a scrollbar should appear if a modal is too large for the
viewport. When false, the ``ModalDialog``. Body receives a scrollbar, when true
the browser window itself receives the scrollbar.

props.name: isFullscreenOnMobile
props.docblock: To show full screen view on mobile screens

description.text: To show full screen view on mobile screens

props.name: isBlocking
props.docblock: Prevent clicking on the backdrop to close the modal

description.text: Prevent clicking on the backdrop to close the modal
